DOC.detailed_description: The ExeQOL study ancillary study ExSTRESS trial ( www.clinicaltrials.gov identifier : NCT01969149 ) . The ExSTRESS trial phase II/III randomized-controlled trial aim assess intravenous exenatide versus insulin perioperative glycemic control CABG surgery . The phase II ExStress trial ass safety efficacy continuous intravenous infusion exenatide management post operative stress hyperglycemia plan coronary artery graft bypass ( CABG ) surgery . The aim phase III ExSTRESS trial compare efficacy continuous intravenous infusion exenatide gold standard treatment , i.e intravenous infusion short-acting insulin , management post operative stress hyperglycemia plan CABG surgery .
DOC.criteria: Age 18 . Patient consent . Non insulin require type 2 diabetic patient . Non diabetic patient . Planned coronary artery bypass graft ( CABG ) surgery . ASA ( American Society Anesthesiologists ) score 1 , 2 , 3 . Pregnancy breast feed . Pancreatectomy . Acute pancreatitis . Chronic pancreatitis . Type 1 diabetic patient . Insulin require type 2 patient . HbA1c > 8 % Ketoacidosis . Hyperosmolar coma . Preoperative blood glucose level 300 mg/dl [ 21 ] . Insulin exenatide contraindication . History renal transplantation currently receive renal dialysis creatinine clearance 60 ml/min . Emergency surgery . Planned non CABG cardiac surgery .
